fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
- Pressure Equipment Directive (97/63) 
- Simple Pressure Vessels Directive (2009/105) 
- Ecodesign Directive: implementing legislation related to or affecting compressors 
- Machinery Directive (2006/42)
organisation_name: European Association of Manufacturers of Compressors, Vacuum Pumps, Pneumatic Tools and Air & Condensate Treatment Equipment (Pneurop)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Pneurop is associate member of Orgalime, the European engineering industries association and cooperates with CAGI (USA).
goals__remit:
Pneurop is the European committee of national associations of manufacturers of compressors, vacuum pumps, pneumatic tools and air & condensate treatment equipment, in 8 EU Member States, Switzerland and Turkey. Pneurop has an associate member in the Ukraine. Pneurop represents more than 200 manufacturers. Pneurop is registered as an international association. 
Pneurop is the spokesperson in European and international forums regarding the harmonisation of technical, normative and legislative developments in the field of compressors, vacuum pumps, pneumatic tools and air & condensate treatment equipment. 
The activities of Pneurop  are carried out by 6 Product Committees, a Marketing Committee and General Secretariat. The work is done by company and association experts on a voluntary basis. The secretariat staff is shared with other associations. 
Pneurop is associate member of Orgalime, the European Engineering Associztion
